How can I re-write the following code segment in C#?
```python
length = len(input)
```

In C#, you can use the `Length` property of a string to achieve the same functionality as the `len()` function in Python. Here's how you can rewrite the given Python code segment in C#:

```csharp
int length = input.Length;
```

In this code, `input` is assumed to be a string variable. The `Length` property returns the number of characters in the string, similar to how `len()` works in Python.
